attributes.action: reclassify alcohol into a class B drug unless cannabis is legalized
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
as cannabis is illegal on the grounds of ?
alcohol should be reclassified under the grounds of violence,car crimes,noise and mess production plus a a lot more reasons

as the current law promotes unruley behaviour legally and bans a natural plant deeming it illegal where both should be at a culturally secure level on par with each other no promotions for either as both are bad for you to some degree but both could be highly taxable and beneficial to the government
